title: Courtyard/ramp/podium accessible to fire fighting appliances (fire engines and other equipment) shall be capable of taking the load up to10 Kg/cm2
clause_text: Courtyard/ramp/podium accessible to fire fighting appliances (fire engines and other equipment) shall be capable of taking the load up to10 Kg/cm2. These open spaces shall be free from any obstruction & shall be motorable.
section: Provided, if the building abuts two roads of 9 m or more, then clear open space of 9 m at ground level on one side deemed to be sufficient.

source_pdf.text_snippet: Courtyard/ramp/podium accessible to fire fighting appliances (fire engines and other equipment) shall be capable of taking the load up to10 Kg/cm2.
